content: माहात्म्यं [महात्मनो भावः ष्यञ्] {@--1@} Magnanimity, noble-mindedness, greatness; <ls>U. 4. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Majesty, dignity, exalted position. {@--3@} The peculiar virtue of any divinity or sacred shrine; or a work giving an account of the merits of such divinities or shrines; as दवोमीहात्म्य, शनिमाहात्म्य &c.
